pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering with Overlaps // Provide functions for overlaps clustering, fuzzy clustering and interval-valued data manipulation. The package implement the following algorithms: OKM (Overlapping Kmeans) from Cleuziou, G. (2007) doi:10.1109/icpr.2008.4761079 ; NEOKM (Non-exhaustive overlapping Kmeans) from Whang, J. J., Dhillon, I. S., and Gleich, D. F. (2015) doi:10.1137/1.9781611974010.105 ; Fuzzy Cmeans from Bezdek, J. C. (1981) doi:10.1007/978-1-4757-0450-1 ; Fuzzy I-Cmeans from de A.T. De Carvalho, F. (2005) doi:10.1016/j.patrec.2006.08.014.
